pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.2: On one occasion the monks Mettiya and Bhūmajaka were descending from the Vulture Peak, when they saw two goats copulating.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.4: “Let’s give the he-goat the name Dabba the Mallian
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.5: and the she-goat the name Mettiya the nun.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.7: ‘Earlier we spoke because of what we had heard about Dabba,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.8: but now we’ve seen him ourselves copulating with the nun Mettiya.’”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.12: “Earlier we spoke about what we had heard,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.13: but now we’ve seen Dabba copulating with the nun Mettiya.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.18: Soon afterwards the Buddha had the Sangha gathered and questioned Dabba:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.19: “Dabba, do you remember doing as these monks say?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.22: and a third time the Buddha asked
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.25: He then said, “Dabba, the Dabbas don’t give such evasive answers.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.26: If it was done by you, say so;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.27: if it wasn’t done by you, then say that.”

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.29: “Well then, monks, call those monks to account,”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.30: and he got up from his seat and entered his dwelling.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.1: The monks then questioned Mettiya and Bhūmajaka, who told them what had happened.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.3: “Did you charge Venerable Dabba with an offense entailing expulsion, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.5: The monks of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.6: “How can Mettiya and Bhūmajaka charge Venerable Dabba like this?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.7: They rebuked those monks in many ways and then told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned the monks:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.8: “Is it true, monks, that you charged Dabba the Mallian with an offense entailing expulsion, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext?”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.11: “… Foolish men, how can you charge Dabba like this?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.13: And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.14.1: ‘If a monk who is angry and displeased, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext, charges a monk with an offense entailing expulsion, aiming to make him leave the monastic life,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.15: and then after some time, whether he is questioned or not, it is clear that the legal issue is unrelated and used as a pretext, and he admits to his ill will, he commits an offense entailing suspension.’”

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.2: It is either unrelated in regard to offenses or unrelated in regard to legal issues.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.3: How is a legal issue unrelated to a legal issue?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.4: A legal issue arising from a dispute is unrelated to a legal issue arising from an accusation, a legal issue arising from an offense, and a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.9: How is a legal issue related to a legal issue?

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.13: How is a legal issue arising from an offense unrelated to a legal issue arising from an offense?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.14: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse is unrelated to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing, an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being, and an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.15: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing is unrelated to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being, an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality, and an offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.17: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality is unrelated to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse, an offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing, and an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.18: It is in this way that a legal issue arising from an offense is unrelated to a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.20: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to sexual intercourse.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.21: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to stealing.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.22: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a human being.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.23: An offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality is related to an offense entailing expulsion in regard to a superhuman quality.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.24: It is in this way that a legal issue arising from an offense is related to a legal issue arising from an offense.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.25: A legal issue arising from business is related to a legal issue arising from business.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.26: It is in this way that a legal issue is related to a legal issue.
